CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Event Feedback stage positioned above or below the Event Attendance stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Event Feedback stage is positioned {below} the Event Attendance stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Event Reattendance?
VE.A: The value of stage Event Reattendance is {320}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Event Feedback?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Event Feedback is {767}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Event Attendance, with a value of {1220}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Event Reattendance, with a value of {320}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback?
SC.A: Decreased by {233} Participants from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1110? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 883? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Event Feedback} stage has {767}, the {Merchandise Purchase} stage has {514}, the {Event Reattendance} stage has {320}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 640 and 883? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Event Feedback to Merchandise Purchase, or from stage Fan Engagement to Post-Event Feedback?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Event Feedback} to {Merchandise Purchase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Merchandise Purchase to Event Reattendance, from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement, or from stage Fan Engagement to Post-Event Feedback?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Fan Engagement} to stage {Post-Event Feedback} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Event Feedback} and {Merchandise Purchase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Merchandise Purchase} and {Event Reattendance} stages.
